channel.title: CVE Feed for TIBCO Software Inc. -- TIBCO BusinessConnect
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TIBCO Software Inc. -- TIBCO BusinessConnect

item.title: CVE-2022-41567|2024-08-03T12:49:41.904Z -- tibco%20software%20inc. -- tibco%20businessconnect
item.description: The BusinessConnect UI component of TIBCO Software Inc.'s TIBCO BusinessConnect contains an easily exploitable vulnerability that allows a low privileged attacker with network access to execute a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack on the affected system. Affected releases are TIBCO Software Inc.'s TIBCO BusinessConnect: versions 7.3.0 and below.
